spark.jobserver.client

接口 IJobServerClientConstants


  • public interface IJobServerClientConstants
    Defines the constants used in public for the spark job server client.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static java.lang.String PARAM_APP_NAME
      It's a necessary parameter used to assign a application name when trying to start a new job.
      static java.lang.String PARAM_CLASS_PATH
      It's a necessary parameter which is a full qualified class name such as 'spark.jobserver.WorkCountExample', used to assign a spark job main class when trying to start a new job.
      static java.lang.String PARAM_CONTEXT
      It's an optional parameter which is an existing context in the calling of GET /contexts, used to assign a context in which the new created job will run.
      static java.lang.String PARAM_CONTEXT_TYPE
      It's an optional parameter which is used to create contexts using context factory.
      static java.lang.String PARAM_MEM_PER_NODE
      Parameter used to create job context, indicates the number of memeory for each spark job executor.
      static java.lang.String PARAM_NUM_CPU_CORES
      Parameter used to create job context, indicates the number of cpu cores for current spark job context.
      static java.lang.String PARAM_NUM_EXECUTORS
      Parameter used to create job context, indicates the executor instances for current spark job context.
      static java.lang.String PARAM_SPARK_CORES_MAX
      Parameter used to create job context, indicates the number of cpu cores for current spark job context.
      static java.lang.String PARAM_SPARK_EXECUTOR_MEMORY
      Parameter used to create job context, indicates the number of memeory for each spark job executor.
      static java.lang.String PARAM_SYNC
      It's an optional parameter which could be "true" or "false", which is used to identify the client will wait for created job 's finish and get the results.
      static java.lang.String PARAM_TIMEOUT
      It's an optional parameter which is the number of seconds the, should wait before timeing out.

    • 字段详细资料

      • PARAM_NUM_EXECUTORS

        static final java.lang.String PARAM_NUM_EXECUTORS
        Parameter used to create job context, indicates the executor instances for current spark job context.

        It's value is integer.

        It is equivalent to PARAM_SPARK_CORES_MAX.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • PARAM_NUM_CPU_CORES

        static final java.lang.String PARAM_NUM_CPU_CORES
        Parameter used to create job context, indicates the number of cpu cores for current spark job context.

        It's value is integer.

        It is equivalent to PARAM_SPARK_CORES_MAX.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • PARAM_SPARK_CORES_MAX

        static final java.lang.String PARAM_SPARK_CORES_MAX
        Parameter used to create job context, indicates the number of cpu cores for current spark job context.

        It's value is integer.

        It is equivalent to PARAM_NUM_CPU_CORES.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • PARAM_MEM_PER_NODE

        static final java.lang.String PARAM_MEM_PER_NODE
        Parameter used to create job context, indicates the number of memeory for each spark job executor.

        It's value is 'xxxm' such as 512m, where xxx is a integer, and m means MB.

        It is equivalent to PARAM_SPARK_EXECUTOR_MEMORY.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • PARAM_SPARK_EXECUTOR_MEMORY

        static final java.lang.String PARAM_SPARK_EXECUTOR_MEMORY
        Parameter used to create job context, indicates the number of memeory for each spark job executor.

        It's value is 'xxxm' such as 512m, where xxx is a integer, and m means MB.

        It is equivalent to PARAM_MEM_PER_NODE.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • PARAM_APP_NAME

        static final java.lang.String PARAM_APP_NAME
        It's a necessary parameter used to assign a application name when trying to start a new job.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • PARAM_CLASS_PATH

        static final java.lang.String PARAM_CLASS_PATH
        It's a necessary parameter which is a full qualified class name such as 'spark.jobserver.WorkCountExample', used to assign a spark job main class when trying to start a new job.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • PARAM_CONTEXT

        static final java.lang.String PARAM_CONTEXT
        It's an optional parameter which is an existing context in the calling of GET /contexts, used to assign a context in which the new created job will run.

        When it wants the new started job to run synchronize and gets the result, It becomes a necessary one.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • PARAM_CONTEXT_TYPE

        static final java.lang.String PARAM_CONTEXT_TYPE
        It's an optional parameter which is used to create contexts using context factory.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • PARAM_SYNC

        static final java.lang.String PARAM_SYNC
        It's an optional parameter which could be "true" or "false", which is used to identify the client will wait for created job 's finish and get the results.

        When it wants the new started job to run synchronize and gets the result, It becomes a necessary one.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • PARAM_TIMEOUT

        static final java.lang.String PARAM_TIMEOUT
        It's an optional parameter which is the number of seconds the, should wait before timeing out. Increasing this value may be required when using sync on long jobs.

        It's value is integer.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值
